comments:
Build ID: WTP153 0206 2007

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Launch WTP (no servers / runtimes nothing)
2. Create a dynamic web project / add to ear
3. delete the projects from workspace (NOTE do not delete contents)
4. Now select 'Import existing projects from workspace' and choose the location (default is current workspace)
  choose the 2 projects (which are still out there in the workspace)
5. Hit finish.
6. Launch the PDE Runtime-Error Log view
It contains these errors

eclipse.buildId=M20070131-1336
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Framework arguments:  -showlocation
Command-line arguments:  -data workspaceDir1 -showlocation

Error
Tue Feb 06 15:28:33 EST 2007
Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.core.resources".

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.common.classpath.J2EEComponentClasspathUpdater.clearResourceTreeRootCache(J2EEComponentClasspathUpdater.java:483)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.common.classpath.J2EEComponentClasspathUpdater.findNode(J2EEComponentClasspathUpdater.java:501)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.common.classpath.J2EEComponentClasspathUpdater.findNode(J2EEComponentClasspathUpdater.java:503)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.common.classpath.J2EEComponentClasspathUpdater.findNode(J2EEComponentClasspathUpdater.java:503)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.common.classpath.J2EEComponentClasspathUpdater.resourceChanged(J2EEComponentClasspathUpdater.java:461)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager$2.run(NotificationManager.java:280)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.SafeRunner.run(SafeRunner.java:37)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager.notify(NotificationManager.java:274)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager.broadcastChanges(NotificationManager.java:148)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.broadcastPostChange(Workspace.java:256)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.endOperation(Workspace.java:958)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.InternalWorkspaceJob.run(InternalWorkspaceJob.java:45)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)




More information:

Created an attachment (id=59393)
patch

We weren't doing some null checks in the J2EEComponentClasspathUpdater. Thanks.

Some of these fixes have already been made.  The patch you attached is based on the head stream (and not the latest version).  If this is targeted for a maintenance stream, please create a new patch based on the latest maintenance code version, otherwise, please create a new patch based on the latest head code.
Removing target milestone of 1.5.4 as per David Williams' instructions.
